message: I agree military spending is huge, but it certainly isn't due to overspending on enlisted families. If your point is that they don't need more troops, I can agree with that too. I reject your claim that the enlisted get more pay than private sector.

Mental health needs more attention and funding for sure. And laws need to change for the families to be able to help their families faster and for the long run. When will enough lives lost to mental illness matter and push for change?

First, you're making irrational assumptions about what I support. Second, forcing a woman to endure the discomfort and risks of pregnancy and childbirth is not the same as forcing a man to pay child support. It's called bodily autonomy. Look it up. Third, access to contraception is not exquisite. The Pill is expensive. IUDs are expensive. Many women can't afford them. Fourth, it's disgusting to tell women not to """"open [our] legs."""" Ugh. Fifth, street harassment is much scarier when committed by someone bigger and stronger than the victim. #maleprivilege

For those of you who say """" Why are these people in France?"""" Ummmm...I dunno...why was France colonizing some of their countries so long? Why didn't FRANCE """" stay where it belonged"""" and not exploit these countries to the point of creating problems that lead to some of this immigration? Please don't tell me Charlie Hebdo targeted only """" radical Muslims"""". One look at the cartoons shows you they were out to insult ALL muslims. How is drawing Mohammed naked with a star on his butt insulting only to """" radical"""" Muslims? """"Mohammed """"may be in a place where he is beyond being harmed by a stupid drawing, but the drawings were also a political and symbolic """"stand-in"""" for the Muslim community, the adherents of which, unlike those of Catholicism in France, are minorities currently in a much weaker position to defend themselves. Stop being so shallow and look at the real situation. PS...freedom of speech in France didn't seem to include mocking DeGaulle and Sarkozy's son. So the French must worship those two people.
This demon creature is clearly doing as much damage as possible - and he is getting away with it.
